=== NEWS ARTICLE ===
Title: Broad-based rally in mid, small-caps unlikely in 2026: Pradeep Gupta, Chairman & MD, Anand Rathi Share and Stock Brokers
Source: LiveMint - Markets
Published: 2025-12-28 04:22
Related Stocks: General Market News
Categories: markets

Summary:
Anand Rathi's Chairman, Pradeep Gupta, shares insights on the Indian stock market, highlighting that 2026 will see earnings-led returns rather than broad-based rallies. He finds domestic cyclicals, such as those linked to capex, manufacturing, and infrastructure, attractive.

Sentiment: positive
